mickel.app.image.project

Interface Codec


  • public interface Codec
    This interface allows one to define their own encoding scheme for compressing the raw data for an RGB image. The pixelsToBytes() method should implement a compression scheme for this algorithm that converts the raw RGB data for a 2-dimensional image into a stream of unsigned bytes. The bytesToPixels() method defines a decompression scheme for this algorithm that reads an encoded stream of unsigned bytes and reinterprets the data as a 2-dimensional, RGB image.
    Author:
    Jeff C. Mickel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Codec RAW
      An instance of the "Raw" RGB codec.

      Pixel[][] bytesToPixels(ByteStream bytes)
      Decodes a compressed data stream into its 2-dimensional image.
      String getExtension()
      Each compression algorithm can be given its own unique file format extension, similar to "gif", "jpg", "png", etc.
      String getName()
      Each compression scheme can be given its own name that describes the algorithm.
      ByteStream pixelsToBytes(Pixel[][] pixels)
      Encodes the data of a 2-dimensional image into a compressed data stream.
